getProperties

public static Properties getProperties(String resourcePath,
                                       String propertiesString)
Reads the properties file located at resourcePath and applies any overrides from external properties files. External properties files may be specified in a file "sanity4j.properties" in the sanity4j directory and/or in the user's home directory and/or Java system properties. Properties are given the following order of precedence:
  • A Java system property.
  • A property in sanity4j.properties in the user's home directory.
  • A property in sanity4j.properties in the sanity4j directory.
  • Internal sanity4j properties from resourcePath.

Parameters:
resourcePath - the internal resource path
propertiesString - a String representing properties values (if any).
Returns:
A Properties map containing the properties from the external file (if any).

getProperties

public static Properties getProperties(String resourcePath)
Parameters:
resourcePath - the internal resource path
Returns:
A Properties map containing the properties from the external file (if any).
See Also:
getProperties(String, String)

replaceTokens

public static String replaceTokens(String string,
                                   Map<String,String> paramMap,
                                   QAConfig config,
                                   String auxClasspath)
Replaces parameter tokens in the given String with their equivalents from the given map, System properties or resources on the classpath. Tokens are specified using ${variableName} syntax.

Parameters:
string - the String to modify
paramMap - the parameter map
config - the current configuration
auxClasspath - an optional auxillary class path to search for resources.
Returns:
the modified String

externalPropertiesPath - the path location to the external properties file.

extractResource

public static File extractResource(QAConfig config,
                                   String resourceName,
                                   String auxClasspath)
                            throws IOException
Attempts to extract a resource to the temp directory.

Parameters:
config - the current configuration.
resourceName - the name of the resource to extract.
auxClasspath - an optional auxillary class path to search for resources.
Returns:
the path to the extracted resource, or null if nothing was extracted
Throws:
IOException - if there is an error extracting the resource.
